name: Chikason app
description:
Chikason app is a game application for the users of android mobile devices. It is an application which the users will find useful when they download it on their Android mobile devices. The game app has excellent features, it contains alot games which will enable the users to select or choose any type they want to play. These are the features of the application: 

1. Airplane Survival Game.

2. Sky Castle Game.

3. Drift Boss Game.

4. Santa  City Run Game.

5. Candy Christmas Game.

6. Super Jump Game.

7. City Ball Dunkin Game.

8. Basketball Legend Game.

9. Knife Dark Game.

10. Flip The Bottle Game.

11. Knock Down Cans Game.

13. Fill The Gap Game.

14. HopStars Game.

15. Classic Pinball Game.

16. Pro Bowling Game.

17. Game Videos.

The purpose of the application

1. To enable the users express Joy and happiness while using the application.

The benefits of the application to the users

1. Derivation of joy and happiness while using the app.

2. It will help the users to learn while using the application.
